channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: First data from XRISM space mission provides new perspective on supermassive black holes
item.description: Data from an international space mission is confirming decades worth of speculation about the galactic neighborhoods of supermassive black holes.
